attributes.action: Postpone or withdraw the October 2007 Petrol & Diesel Increase in Fuel Duty until at least April 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Postpone or withdraw the October 2007 Petrol & Diesel Increase in Fuel Duty until at least April 2008. This would able the cost of fuel to be cheaper for people who require to use there car for everyday life!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
